name: sell_item
attributes: # [doc = " アイテムをショップに売却し、通貨を受け取るが、"]
# [doc = " item_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let item_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . item_account ;
* * ctx . accounts . shop_treasury . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= price ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += price ;

fields.name: item_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 売却を実行するユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: shop_treasury
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 売却金を保管するショップ財務口座"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 売却価格設定を保持するアカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " このアイテムを所有すべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: sold_price
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 実際に売却された価格"]

fields.name: sale_price
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 1アイテムあたりの売却価格（Lamports）"]
